MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.Azure.Management.RecoveryServices.Backup.BackupOperationsExtensions.TriggerBackup (operations, resourceGroupName, resourceName, customRequestHeaders, fabricName, containerName, protectedItemName, request)

Docs.param: Required. Resource group name of your recovery services vault.
Required. Name of your recovery services vault.
Optional. Fabric name of the protected item.
Optional. Name of the container where the protected item belongs to.
Optional. Name of the protected item which has to be backed up.
Optional. Backup request for the backup item.
Docs.summary: The Trigger Backup Operation starts an operation in the service which triggers the backup of the specified item in the specified container in your Recovery Services Vault. This is an asynchronous operation. To determine whether the backend service has finished processing the request, call Get Protected Item Operation Result API.
Docs.returns: Base recovery job response for all the asynchronous operations.
